Package HMS.src.prescription

Class PrescriptionManager

java.lang.Object
HMS.src.prescription.PrescriptionManager
public class PrescriptionManager extends Object
Manages the processing, updating, and displaying of prescription records.

      Processes the status update for a specific prescription.
      Parameters:
      prescriptions - List of prescriptions.
      prescriptionId - The ID of the prescription to update.

    • getPharmNameByID

      public static String getPharmNameByID(String pharmID)
      Gets the pharmacist name by its ID.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      The pharmacist name if found, null otherwise

      private void printPrescriptions(List<String[]> data, boolean skipHeader)
      Prints the list of prescriptions in a tabular format.
      Parameters:
      data - List of prescription records.
      skipHeader - Whether to skip the header row in the data.
